snippet: In losing the soap opera, the Syrian government has lost one of its most powerful means of spreading ideas and political messages.
abstract: Op-Ed article by researcher Omar Adam Sayfo laments the shelving of Syria's favorite television soap operas as the conflict continues; asserts that the Syrian government has lost one of its most powerful means of spreading anti-sectarian ideas and political messages.
lead_paragraph: In losing the soap opera, the Syrian government has lost one of its most powerful means of spreading ideas and political messages.
